meanings.sent1: We were coplotting our surprise party for Mom.
meanings.sent2: The team coplotting the school play had great ideas.
meanings.sent3: Coplotting a fun day out with friends can lead to unexpected adventures.
meanings.sent4: Their coplotting resulted in a successful business venture.
meanings.sent5: Coplotting a treasure hunt made the activity more exciting.

meanings.definition: The act of plotting or planning together
meanings.sent1: Their coplotting was evident in the detailed map they created.
meanings.sent2: The coplotting among the group members made the project successful.
meanings.sent3: The coplotting for the surprise party was kept secret from Mom.
meanings.sent4: The coplotting of the characters in the story added depth to the plot.
meanings.sent5: The coplotting of the friends made the adventure more thrilling.
